proposal1.heroHeadline: ThriveLine is losing 120 hours a year creating proposals. Here's how it happens.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Manually crafting each proposal distracts from designing and optimizing websites. In 47 seconds, automation can handle it.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Each issue below details ongoing losses ThriveLine faces.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Manual proposal creation takes up 10 hours a month. That's 120 hours a year not spent enhancing clients' web presence.

problems.title: Lost Opportunities
problems.description: Every hour writing is an hour not spent on new client acquisition. This costs ThriveLine potential new business every month.

problems.title: Human Error
problems.description: Mistakes in proposals can lead to lost deals. Manual processes increase the risk, costing thousands in missed revenue.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Inconsistent proposals dilute brand image. This can result in lowered client trust and less repeat business.

problems.title: High Stress
problems.description: Proposal deadlines create stress for a two-person team. Stress can lead to burnout, impacting overall productivity and service quality.

problems.title: Client Delays
problems.description: Slow proposal turnaround keeps clients waiting, which risks losing them to faster competitors. This directly affects your bottom line.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces all these losses with efficiency and speed.

solutions.title: Instant Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft. Our system completes them in under 60 seconds, freeing up valuable time.

solutions.title: Error-Free Proposals
solutions.description: Human errors in proposals can cost deals. Our AI ensures accuracy and consistency every time.

solutions.title: Brand Cohesion
solutions.description: Manual processes lead to inconsistent branding. Our system ensures every proposal reflects ThriveLine's unique brand perfectly.

solutions.title: Stress Reduction
solutions.description: Proposal deadlines add pressure. Automation alleviates stress by handling the heavy lifting.

solutions.title: Client Engagement
solutions.description: Manual proposals delay client interaction. Our system's speed keeps clients engaged and reduces the chance they look elsewhere.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for ThriveLine's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for ThriveLine around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for ThriveLine.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Boost Acme Corp's Online Presence with ThriveLine's Expertise.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: Let's transform your digital footprint with a strategic plan that drives results and growth. Our tailored approach ensures every dollar works harder for you.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Currently, Acme Corp is experiencing revenue leaks due to untapped digital potential.

problems.title: Website Bounce Rates
problems.description: High bounce rates mean potential customers are leaving too soon. This results in a loss of potential sales and brand engagement.

problems.title: Ineffective SEO
problems.description: Without proper SEO, Acme Corp is missing out on valuable organic traffic, leading to decreased visibility and fewer leads.

problems.title: Weak Social Media Engagement
problems.description: Low engagement on social media channels translates to missed opportunities for brand interaction and customer loyalty.

problems.title: Outdated Design
problems.description: An outdated website design can drive visitors away, costing you credibility and potential conversions.

problems.title: Poor Conversion Rates
problems.description: Every visitor who doesn't convert is a missed sale. Optimizing conversion rates is crucial for maximizing revenue.

problems.title: Unoptimized Paid Campaigns
problems.description: Inefficient paid campaigns result in wasted ad spend and lower ROI, impacting overall marketing budget effectiveness.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our solutions address these losses by enhancing Acme Corp's digital strategy.

solutions.title: Web Design & Development
solutions.description: We create engaging, modern websites that convert visitors into customers. Say goodbye to high bounce rates.

solutions.title: SEO Optimization
solutions.description: Drive more organic traffic by climbing the search rankings. Increased visibility equals more leads.

solutions.title: Social Media Strategy
solutions.description: Boost engagement and foster brand loyalty with a tailored social media plan.

solutions.title: Paid Media Management
solutions.description: Improve ROI on ad spend by optimizing campaigns for better performance and lower costs.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: ThriveLine is your partner in growth, with a warm, personal touch.

whyUsCards.title: Creative Excellence
whyUsCards.description: Our designs are not only beautiful but also functional, driving user engagement.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Strategies
whyUsCards.description: We utilize data-driven strategies that have been successful for numerous clients.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We listen to your needs and tailor our services to ensure your success.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Thinking
whyUsCards.description: We stay ahead of trends, ensuring your brand does too.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team that makes magic happen.

team.name: Marie-line Villers
team.bio: Marie-line leads strategy and client relationships with a keen eye for detail and a passion for results. She's dedicated to ensuring every client feels valued and understood.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: We dive deep into understanding your business and set a strategic plan.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: Crafting a design that speaks to your audience and developing a robust platform.

process.title: Optimization & Testing
process.description: Refining and testing to ensure everything works perfectly.

process.title: Launch & Review
process.description: Time to go live and review the initial results for further optimization.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Consider these as smart investment options tailored for your growth.

pricing.name: Basic Growth Plan
pricing.description: Ideal for small businesses looking to establish an online presence.

pricing.name: Advanced Growth Plan
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses ready to expand their reach and impact.

pricing.name: Premium Growth Plan
pricing.description: For businesses aiming for market leadership with comprehensive services.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's have a chat about how we can help you thrive online. No pressure, just possibilities.

lead.company_description:
Transforming Kelowna Businesses Through Web Design & SEO Excellence.
From tailored websites to strategic local SEO, we empower Kelowna businesses to reach new heights online. Discover the difference a custom digital approach can make for your brand.
lead.headline: Seo Specialist | Hand Coding Expert
lead.company_technologies: ai, android, flutter, gmail, google apps, google tag manager, iot, laravel, magento, mailchimp mandrill, mobile friendly, python, remote, sharepoint, sparkpost, wordpress.org, xamarin
lead.keywords: web hosting, search engine optimization, web design, web maintenance, local seo, web repairs, design services, information technology & services, seo, search marketing, marketing, marketing & advertising
